{"id":1262550637,"question_id":3307,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"6 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1716150753,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1262550637/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find the Maximum Sum of Node Values","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    long long maximumValueSum(vector<int>& nums, int k, vector<vector<int>>& edges) {\n        int N = (int)nums.size();\n        vector<vector<int>> adj_list(N);\n        vector<int> dp(N, 0);\n\n        for (auto i : edges) {\n            adj_list[i[0]].push_back(i[1]);\n            adj_list[i[1]].push_back(i[0]);\n        }\n\n        dp[0] = nums[0]; \n        for (int i=1; i<N; i++) {\n            dp[i] = dp[i-1] + nums[i];\n            for (int j : adj_list[i]) {\n                if (i < j) continue;\n                if (dp[i] < dp[i-1] + (nums[i]^k) - nums[j] + (nums[j]^k)) {\n                    dp[i] = dp[i-1] + (nums[i]^k) - nums[j] + (nums[j]^k);\n                    nums[i] ^= k;\n                    nums[j] ^= k;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return dp[N-1];\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-the-maximum-sum-of-node-values","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
